title: Ted Lasso = George W Bush? Dr. Oz’s Favorite Dish! 4.13.22
itunes:title: Ted Lasso = George W Bush? Dr. Oz’s Favorite Dish! 4.13.22
description:
In episode 1225, Jack and Miles are joined by journalist and host of HEIDI WORLD: The Heidi Fleiss Story, Molly Lambert to discuss… Trump officially endorses Dr Oz, conservatives have meltdown, Stray Thought - Ted Lasso Is George W Bush As Current Populous Imagines Him, Sarah Palin is Running For Congress Against Santa Claus and more!

  1. Trump officially endorses Dr Oz, conservatives have meltdown
  2. Herschel Walker: America 'giving up all the energy'
  3. Dr. Oz Gave Dr. Oz Show Staff 15 Minutes’ Notice That He’s Quitting to Run for Senate in State Where He May Not Live
  4. Dr. Oz Goes Grocery Shopping And The Twitter Mockery Is Priceless
  5. The Backlash Over Trump’s Dr. Oz Endorsement Shows His Hold on the GOP Is Slipping
  6. Stray Thought - Ted Lasso Is George W Bush As Current Populous Imagines Him
  7. Sarah Palin is Running For Congress Against Santa Claus
  8. Sarah Palin and Santa Claus file to run for Congress from Alaska
  9. Santa Claus is a candidate for President of the United States in 2012
  10. The strange story of a real-life Santa Claus, North Pole’s newest city councilperson
  11. 31% of Alaskans support Sarah Palin's new House campaign. But 51% say they have an unfavorable opinion of her.

LISTEN: WHAT MORE (feat. Greentea Peng) by Swindle

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
